long_description: The Arc'teryx Atom LT is an insulated, mid-layer jacket with a wind- and moisture-resistant outer shell. It offers balanced warmth and breathability for those ambitious days when the mercury plummets. Lightweight and compressible, the Atom LT features Coreloft(TM) synthetic insulation in the torso, arms and hood; it insulates even when wet. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) with Hardface(R) side panels and underarms increase range of motion and breathability. Durable Water Repellent outer shell finish extends stand-alone usability. Front zipper features an insulated windflap. Gusseted underarms and articulated elbows ensure a good fit. Laminated hem drawcord and stretch knit wrist gaskets hold in warmth. 2 hand pockets and 1 internal chest pocket. Hip length with drop back hem; trim fit maximizes heat retention.
